histogram.name: Geolocation.Android.LocationPermissionState
histogram.summary: Android location permission state, recorded when the geolocation permission context is initialized.

histogram.name: Geolocation.CoreLocationProvider.Accuracy
histogram.summary: Records the accuracy value (in meters) of a valid Geoposition. Values above 10000 meters are considered very inaccurate and are categorized into the overflow bucket. This cap prioritizes accuracy resolution in the lower range.

histogram.name: Geolocation.CoreLocationProvider.ErrorCode
histogram.summary: Records an enumeration value corresponding to the specific error encountered by the CoreLocationProvider while obtaining the device's location.

histogram.name: Geolocation.CoreLocationProvider.SessionResult
histogram.summary: Records the overall result of a geolocation session using the CoreLocationProvider. This metric captures the CoreLocationSessionResult representing the final outcome of the session, which could be a success result or any error encountered that prevented the provider from obtaining a valid position. If the session result is kCoreLocationError then the specific error reported by the platform is recorded in the Geolocation.CoreLocationProvider.ErrorCode metric.

histogram.name: Geolocation.CoreLocationProvider.TimeToFirstPosition
histogram.summary: Records the time duration for getting the first valid Geoposition.

histogram.name: Geolocation.GeolocationImpl.ClientId
histogram.summary: Records an enumeration value when a GeolocationImpl requests the next location estimate. The recorded value identifies the client that created the GeolocationImpl.

histogram.name: Geolocation.IOS.ChangedAuthorizationState
histogram.summary: iOS location permission state, recorded when geolocation permission state changes while the app is running.

histogram.name: Geolocation.IOS.InitialAuthorizationState
histogram.summary: iOS location permission state, recorded at startup.

histogram.name: Geolocation.LocationProviderManager.Mode
histogram.summary: Records the mode of the LocationProviderManager that acquires a valid Geoposition.

histogram.name: Geolocation.LocationProviderManager.Source
histogram.summary: Records the location provider source of the LocationProviderManager that acquires a valid Geoposition.

histogram.name: Geolocation.LocationProviderWinrt.Accuracy
histogram.summary: Records the accuracy value of a valid Geoposition.

histogram.name: Geolocation.LocationProviderWinrt.CreateGeoposition
histogram.summary: Records the HRESULT error code encountered when creating a mojom Geoposition object.

histogram.name: Geolocation.LocationProviderWinrt.ErrorStatus
histogram.summary: Records an enumeration value representing the system position status that is considered an error status.

histogram.name: Geolocation.LocationProviderWinrt.OnPositionChanged
histogram.summary: Records the HRESULT error code encountered when processing a position changed event.

histogram.name: Geolocation.LocationProviderWinrt.OnStatusChanged
histogram.summary: Records the HRESULT error code encountered when processing a status changed event.

histogram.name: Geolocation.LocationProviderWinrt.PositionSource
histogram.summary: Records an enumeration value representing the position source for generating a valid Geoposition.

histogram.name: Geolocation.LocationProviderWinrt.RegisterCallbacks
histogram.summary: Records the HRESULT error code encountered when registering callbacks for position and stauts changed events.

histogram.name: Geolocation.LocationProviderWinrt.SessionResult
histogram.summary: Records the overall result of a geolocation session using the LocationProviderWinrt. This metric captures the HRESULT representing the final outcome of the session, which could be a success (S_OK) or any error encountered that prevented the provider from obtaining a valid position.

histogram.name: Geolocation.LocationProviderWinrt.StartProvider
histogram.summary: Records the HRESULT error code encountered when starting the Windows platform geolocation provider.

histogram.name: Geolocation.LocationProviderWinrt.TimeToFirstPosition
histogram.summary: Records the time duration for getting the first valid Geoposition.

histogram.name: Geolocation.NetworkLocationProvider.SessionResult
histogram.summary: Records the overall result of a geolocation session using the NetworkLocationProvider. This metric captures the NetworkLocationRequestResult representing the final outcome of the session, which could be a success result or first error encountered that prevented the provider from obtaining a valid position. Noted that a short-lived session without a position or error updated is not recorded.

histogram.name: Geolocation.NetworkLocationProvider.TimeToFirstPosition
histogram.summary: Records the time duration between starting the provider and getting the first valid Geoposition for NetworkLocationProvider.

histogram.name: Geolocation.NetworkLocationRequest.Accuracy
histogram.summary: Records the accuracy value of a valid Geoposition from the NetworkLocationProvider.

histogram.name: Geolocation.NetworkLocationRequest.RequestInterval
histogram.summary: For recording the time gap between each HTTP request to geolocation service. The maximum bucket is 10 minutes because that is the maxium interval between wifi data polls.

histogram.name: Geolocation.NetworkLocationRequest.ResponseCode
Geolocation.NetworkLocationRequest.Result
histogram.summary:
Records the outcome of a network location request, indicating whether the request succeeded, was canceled, or failed due to various reasons such as network errors, invalid responses, or malformed data. This histogram helps track the distribution of different outcomes for network location requests.
Note: Before M131, this histogram was originally named Geolocation.NetworkLocationRequest.Event.

histogram.name: Geolocation.NetworkLocationRequest.Source
histogram.summary: Records an enumeration value when a network request has been sent to the network location service. The recorded value identifies the provider that initiated the request.

histogram.name: Geolocation.PublicIpAddressGeolocator.ClientId
histogram.summary: Records an enumeration value when a PublicIpAddressGeolocator requests the next location estimate. The recorded value identifies the client that created the PublicIpAddressGeolocator.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SystemGeolocationSourceWin.CheckAccessError
histogram.summary: Records the HRESULT error code encountered while checking location access status on Windows.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SystemGeolocationSourceWin.CreateAppCapabilityError
histogram.summary: Records the HRESULT error code encountered while creating the location app capability object on Windows.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SystemGeolocationSourceWin.InitialPermissionStatus
histogram.summary: Records an enumeration value representing the current system location permission state when SystemGeolocationSourceWin is initialized at browser startup on Windows.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SystemGeolocationSourceWin.LaunchSettingsResult
histogram.summary: Records the HRESULT error code encountered while launching the Windows settings page, or S_OK if the settings page was launched without errors.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SystemGeolocationSourceWin.PermissionStatusChanged
histogram.summary: Records an enumeration value representing the current system location permission state when SystemGeolocationSourceWin detects that the system location permission has changed state. Not recorded if the permission changed after showing the system permission prompt.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SystemGeolocationSourceWin.PermissionStatusChangedAfterPrompt
histogram.summary: Records an enumeration value representing the system location permission state following the first location permission state change after the Windows system permission prompt was shown.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SystemGeolocationSourceWin.RequestAccessResult
histogram.summary: Records the HRESULT error code encountered while requesting location access, or S_OK if location access was requested without errors.
